channel.description: Recent content in status on Sadegh

item.title: Status update #1
item.description: I have been spending so much time and energy tweaking this website, that I feel like I should maintain a log for it. No Git commit messages are not enough anymore. It’s kinda fun owning a place on the internet but at the same time it should at least mean something. Also It is a better place to write about personal experiences about non tech stuff and I don’t have to worry about too much for the content.
